name: DeepOnline
description:
Whats DeepOnline ?

It's a free MMORPG from Green Cherry Studio, where you play in a big world, with lots of enemies and locations! You can enter houses, buy items in the store, you also can play with friends!

Features:

- Beautiful pixelated graphics!

- Ability to level up your character for in-game currency!

- Beautiful soundtracks from Who! Different for each location!

- Working online! It'll be fun!)
